errors.main: 🚧 An error occurred. Try again later!
errors.file-too-large: 🚧 The image is above 8MB, I cannot display it.

commands.in-cooldown_one: you are in cooldown, please wait another second.
commands.in-cooldown_other: you are in cooldown, please wait {{seconds}} seconds.

language.name: language
language.description: set the bot language on your guild.
language.current-language: the current language of this guild is {{language}}.
language.already-set: the language of this guild is already set to {{language}}.
language.language-changed: the language of this guild has been set to {{language}}.

modules.name: modules

embed.description:
> To set up modules you must do `/modules set <type> <on/off>`.
> To reset configured modules you must do `/modules reset <type>`.

Current modules:

{{modules}}

modules.all-modules-reset: all the configured modules were reset.
modules.module-not-available: module type `{{moduleType}}` is not available. Valid types: `{{validTypes}}`.
modules.invalid-toggle-value: invalid toggle value `{{value}}`. Please use `on` or `off`.
modules.module-not-editable: the `{{moduleType}}` module cannot be changed as it's marked as non-editable.
modules.provide-module-or-all: please provide a module type or "all".
modules.all-modules-default: all modules are already at their default configuration.
modules.all-reset: all modules have been reset to their default configuration.
modules.default-not-found: Cannot find default configuration for the `{{moduleType}}` module.
modules.module-already-default: The `{{moduleType}}` module is already at its default configuration.
modules.module-reset: the `{{moduleType}}` module has been reset to its default configuration.

about.name: about

embed.description:
{{clientUsername}} is a open-source Discord bot that is designed to help you with your server. It has a lot of features that can help you with moderation, fun, and utility. It is developed by {{maintainers}}.

The bot is running on version `{{version}}`, using discord.js library (version `{{discordJsVersion}}` - node v`{{nodeVersion}}`).

about.shards-info: {{shardStats}} / {{shardCount}} shards are online. For more information do `/about --shards`.

embed.description:
to get more details about how to use commands, do `/help <command>`.
**The bot works with command modules that can be enabled and disabled. To manage them, consult modules menu via the command `/modules`.**
  
[`GitHub`](https://github.com/dankerow/blop) | [`🎈 Invite`](https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=912113776176820234&permissions=2146958583&scope=bot)
embed.footer: <> means required command parameter | [] means optional command parameter

3d.name: 3d
3d.description: applies a 3D effect to your avatar.

beautiful.name: beautiful
beautiful.description: generates the Gravity Falls meme "Oh this is beautiful" using your avatar.

blur.name: blur
blur.description: applies a blur effect on your avatar.

blurple.name: blurple
blurple.description: applies the blurpify effect on your avatar.

bobross.name: bobross
bobross.description: generates the Bobross meme using your avatar.

challenger.name: challenger
challenger.description: generates the "CHALLENGER" meme using your avatar.

contrast.name: contrast
contrast.description: applies a contrast effect to your avatar.

distort.name: distort
distort.description: applies a distortion effect to your avatar.

fade.name: fade
fade.description: applies a fade effect to your avatar.

frame.name: frame
frame.description: generates your avatar with frame borders.

greyscale.name: greyscale
greyscale.description: applies a grayscale effect on your avatar.

invert.name: invert
invert.description: applies an inversion effect on your avatar.

pixelate.name: pixelate
pixelate.description: applies a pixelation effect to your avatar.

prison.name: prison
prison.description: draws prison bars over your avatar.

rainbow.name: rainbow
rainbow.description: generates a rainbow effect using your avatar.

rip.name: rip
rip.description: generates a R.I.P meme using your avatar.

sepia.name: sepia
sepia.description: applies a sepia filter to your avatar.

triggered.name: triggered
triggered.description: generates a triggered GIF using your avatar.

wasted.name: wasted
wasted.description: generates the "WASTED" meme using your avatar.

worthless.name: worthless
worthless.description: generates the "WORTHLESS" meme using your avatar.

avatar.name: avatar
avatar.description: displays a specific user's avatar or your avatar.

field-4.value: there are `{{roleCount}}` role(s) on the server, do `/guild --roles` to see them.

field-5.value: there are `{{emojiCount}}` emote(s) on the server, do `/guild --emotes` to see them.

uptime.name: uptime
uptime.description: gives the uptime of bot and server.
